General.Name: CWB Automotive Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: CWB Automotive Electronics Co., Ltd. engaged in the research and development, production, and sales of automotive and consumer electronics components in China and internationally. The company offers automotive electronics, such as engine management, transmission, steering, chassis control, auto-body control, infotainment, power, and gas exhaust systems. It also provides consumer electronics comprising wire to board, wire to wire, board to board, and quick connectors, as well as FPC/FFC products. The company was formerly known as CWB Automotive Zhejiang Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CWB Automotive Electronics Co., Ltd. in June 2018. CWB Automotive Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yueqing, China.
General.Address: No.1098, East Xingfu Road, Yueqing, China, 325608
